snippet.title: My Devil Girlfriend Romance You Choose (Android) - Ep 1
snippet.description:
Download : https://goo.gl/niYBH5

“My Devil Girlfriend: Romance You Choose”

*You can play this game until the end for free!
*Make different choices to see new scenes and learn more about the characters and world.
*This is an interactive romance visual novel featuring devils, angels, and those who walk the line between them.
*Step into the shoes of a young man who becomes mixed up in the schemes of three mysterious and beautiful devils!


~ Synopsis ~

When you begin your senior year of high school, you’re startled by the presence of a new transfer student named Carmilla, the most beautiful girl you’ve ever seen.

That night, you find yourself in a strange world of fire and brimstone, and two devils stand in front of you.

“I have the power to make Carmilla fall in love with you. All you need to do is kiss me, and our contract will begin.”

Believing it to be a dream, you kiss them both, only for them to appear at your school the next day.

Not only that, but they tell you that Carmilla is also a devil, and she has plans of her own…


~ Characters ~

*[Mysterious] Carmilla
Why did Carmilla come to your school? What is she planning? The more you learn about Carmilla’s secrets, the more you suspect she isn’t as cold as she seems.

*[Seductive] Lily
Determined and manipulative, Lily hopes to escape her prison through her partnership with you. Although she’s technically in a contract with you, her goals don’t necessarily align with yours.

*[Mischievous] Nikki
Nikki is wild and carefree, helping Lily with her scheme just to see what will happen. Although it might seem like she doesn’t care about anything except having fun, there’s more to her than meets the eye.


As you make choices throughout the story, you’ll get to know these three devils and come to understand their goals and the forces aligned against them. Will one of them win your heart?

Kalau kalian punya pertanyaan mengenai video di atas, dapat komentar di bawah ya.

Subscribe Gratis : https://goo.gl/qQtFXd

|========================================================|

Makasih buat kalian yang sudah nonton,
Jangan lupa di subscribe, comment dan like video ini. Klik tombol lonceng / Bell agar notifikasi tentang video baruku.
Kalau kalian ingin memberikan saran untuk gw, silahkan aja comment dibawah yaa.

Dan jangan lupa buat follow account Social Media gue dibawah :

Instagram : http://bit.ly/IGDiarkus
Facebook : http://bit.ly/FBKage

Tarimo kasih yo

|========================================================|

Guide, Cara , Tutorial , Tips and Trick , How to , Mini World Block Art , Android , Ragnarok M Eternal Love , Harvest Moon , Light of Hope
